title: Do you want Rip Clipourne to make it 'give every voice and sing' a national cheer?
subtitle: This song, which has long been considered the black national anthem, can gain prominence.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In January 2021, the Republic of James Claybourne put forward a proposal in the House of Representatives to make "the giving of every voice and singing" a national song, placing it on an equal footing with the national anthem.
